scripts.build: tsc && cp src/*.js public/javascripts/ && browserify src/webmap.js -t [localenvify --envfile ../.env ] -o public/javascripts/webmap.js && browserify src/L.KML.js -t [localenvify --envfile ../.env ] -o public/javascripts/L.KML.js && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css public/stylesheets/leaflet.css
